channel.title: Favorite forum moments
channel.description:
Post links/pictures of threads/posts that made you laugh/facepalm/rage.
inb4thisthreadgetslinkedtoitself
I'll start. [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/20l0xtk.png[/img]

item.title: Favorite forum moments
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

Tom<3

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=jmood128 link=topic=500348.msg3659238#msg3659238 date=1310247326]

How exactly do you optimize a configuration file?

I didn’t know configuration files tell the server to lag?
[/quote][code=Java]BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new FileReader(“HARDCODED_PATH/file.cfg”));
line = br.readLine();

if (line.contains(“lag”)) {
lag();
}[/code]LOL[/quote]

Read full topic

It’s forum moments. Meaning, at what moment, did this make you laugh, facepalm, or question why a person exists on this earth.

item.title: Favorite forum moments
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

My topic is also specific. It’s forum moments. Meaning, at what moment, did this make you laugh, facepalm, or question why a person exists on this earth.

Yours is quotes, which means, someone must of said something either:

Funny, intellectual, or stupid.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Rash, post:87, topic:380518”][quote author=Phaze One link=topic=476347.msg3522261#msg3522261 date=1299478415]

the one where the kid said

“the server turns off when i turn off the computer and no one can get on. why does it do that?”

and than silab stickied it. lawl XD
[/quote]You registered today, and have 3 posts. I doubt you were around during that topic, UNLESS you have multiple accounts, or possibly ban evading.

or maybe he was around long before you and forgot his account details you moron

SMF has this thing, called account recovery.[/quote]Everything he has was hacked; there’s no way to recover your account then. (Even his email)

Read full topic
